mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.RESOUCE_CATEGORY_ID) AS "resouceCategoryId", T.RESOUCE_CATEGORY_NAME AS "resouceCategoryName" FROM AHZH_USER.EPM_RESOUCE_CATEGORY T WHERE T.RESOUCE_TYPE != 6 AND T.RESOUCE_CATEGORY_PID = 0
SELECT T.RESOUCE_CATEGORY_NAME AS "resouceCategoryName" FROM AHZH_USER.EPM_RESOUCE_CATEGORY T WHERE T.RESOUCE_TYPE != 6 AND T.RESOUCE_CATEGORY_PID = TO_NUMBER(#{resouceCategoryId})

SELECT T.APPLY_BILL_NO AS "sysNumber", --申请单号 LOAN_PROJECT_ID AS "projectId", -- 关联项目id (SELECT T2.PROJECT_NAME FROM AHZH_USER.EPM_PROJECT T2 WHERE T2.PROJECT_ID = T.LOAN_PROJECT_ID) AS "projectName", -- 关联项目 (SELECT DISTINCT T2.PARTNER FROM AHZH_USER.VIEW_BASE_PROJECT T2 WHERE T2.PROJECT_ID = T.LOAN_PROJECT_ID) AS "partnerName", -- 使用合伙人 (SELECT T2.PARTNER_ID FROM AHZH_USER.VIEW_BASE_PROJECT T2 WHERE T2.PROJECT_ID = T.LOAN_PROJECT_ID) AS "partnerId", -- 使用合伙人Id (SELECT T2.HOLDER_ID FROM AHZH_USER.VIEW_BASE_PROJECT T2 WHERE T2.PROJECT_ID = T.LOAN_PROJECT_ID) AS "ownerId", -- 业主ID (SELECT T2.HOLDER FROM AHZH_USER.VIEW_BASE_PROJECT T2 WHERE T2.PROJECT_ID = T.LOAN_PROJECT_ID) AS "ownerName", -- 业主名称 (SELECT SUBSTR(T2.ORGNAME, INSTR(T2.ORGNAME, '-', 1, 1) + 1) FROM AHZH_USER.CPCORG T2 WHERE T2.ORGID = T.APPLY_DEPT_ID) AS "orgName", -- 申请部门 ESTIMATED_LOAN_DATE AS "expectLendTime", -- 预计借出时间 ESTIMATED_RETURN_DATE AS "expectReturnTime", -- 预计归还时间 '' AS "actualReturnTime", -- 实际归还时间 LOAN_DESCRIPTION AS "use", -- 用途 (SELECT T2.USERID FROM AHZH_USER.CPCUSER T2 WHERE T2.SYSUSERID = T.LOAN_PERSON_ID) AS "userBy", -- 使用人 CREATE_BY AS "createBy", -- 创建人 CREATE_DATE AS "createTime", -- 创建时间 LAST_UPDATED_BY AS "updateBy", -- 修改人 LAST_UPDATED_DATE AS "updateTime", -- 修改时间 RESOUCE_LOAN_RETURN_HEAD_ID AS "applyId", -- 申请Id DECODE(STAT, 0, '0', 1, '0', 3, '0', 5, '4', 99, '2', '') AS "status", -- 状态 APPLY_PERSON_ID AS "applyBy", -- 申请人 (SELECT T2.USERID FROM AHZH_USER.CPCUSER T2 WHERE T2.SYSUSERID = T.APPLY_PERSON_ID) AS "applyByRealName", --申请人真实姓名 TO_DATE(APPLY_BILL_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS') AS "applyDate" --申请时间 FROM AHZH_USER.EPM_RESOUCE_LOAN_RETURN_HEAD T
SELECT DOCID AS "fileId", --附件ID DOCNAME AS "fileName", --附件名称 URL AS "fileUrl" --附件地址 FROM AHZH_USER.VIEW_SYS_ATTACH

SELECT T.RESOURCE_IDENTIFIER AS "number", -- 证件编号 RESOUCE_ARCHIVES_ID AS "archiveId", -- 档案id DECODE(STAT, '在库', '0', '锁定', '1', '已借出', '1') AS "useStatus", -- 使用状态 '0' AS "delFlag", -- 删除标识 EFFECTIVE_DATE AS "startDate", -- 生效时间 EXP_DATE AS "endDate", -- 失效时间 REMARK AS "remarks", -- 备注 CREATE_BY AS "createBy", -- 创建人 CREATE_DATE AS "createTime", -- 创建时间 LAST_UPDATE_BY AS "updateBy", -- 修改人 LAST_UPDATE_DATE AS "updateTime", -- 修改时间 RESOURCE_NAME AS "name", -- 档案名称 (SELECT T2.USERNAME FROM AHZH_USER.CPCUSER T2 WHERE T2.SYSUSERID = T.KEEPER) AS "safekeepUser", -- 保管人 T.KEEPER AS "safekeepUserId", -- 保管人Id IS_USABLE AS "isEnabled", -- 是否可用 '公司证照' AS "parentType", -- 证件类型父类 (SELECT RESOUCE_CATEGORY_ID FROM AHZH_USER.EPM_RESOUCE_CATEGORY T2 WHERE T2.RESOUCE_CATEGORY_NAME = '公司证照') AS "parentTypeId", -- 证件类型父类Id T.RESOUCE_CATEGORY_ID AS "typeId", -- 证件类型子类Id (SELECT RESOUCE_CATEGORY_NAME FROM AHZH_USER.EPM_RESOUCE_CATEGORY T2 WHERE T2.RESOUCE_CATEGORY_ID = T.RESOUCE_CATEGORY_ID) AS "type", -- 证件类型子类 '0' AS "archiveType", -- 档案类型 '' AS "validityStatus", -- 有效期状态 RESOURCE_ARCHIVES_CODE AS "sysNumber" -- 档案编号 FROM AHZH_USER.EPM_RESOUCE_ARCHIVES T WHERE RESOUCE_TYPE = 1

SELECT T.RESOURCE_IDENTIFIER AS "number", -- 证件编号 RESOUCE_ARCHIVES_ID AS "archiveId", -- 档案id DECODE(STAT, '在库', '0', '锁定', '1', '已借出', '1') AS "useStatus", -- 使用状态 '0' AS "delFlag", -- 删除标识 EFFECTIVE_DATE AS "startDate", -- 生效时间 EXP_DATE AS "endDate", -- 失效时间 REMARK AS "remarks", -- 备注 CREATE_BY AS "createBy", -- 创建人 CREATE_DATE AS "createTime", -- 创建时间 LAST_UPDATE_BY AS "updateBy", -- 修改人 LAST_UPDATE_DATE AS "updateTime", -- 修改时间 RESOURCE_NAME AS "name", -- 档案名称 (SELECT T2.USERNAME FROM AHZH_USER.CPCUSER T2 WHERE T2.SYSUSERID = T.KEEPER) AS "safekeepUser", -- 保管人 T.KEEPER AS "safekeepUserId", -- 保管人Id IS_USABLE AS "isEnabled", -- 是否可用 '人员证照' AS "parentType", -- 证件类型父类 (SELECT RESOUCE_CATEGORY_ID FROM AHZH_USER.EPM_RESOUCE_CATEGORY T2 WHERE T2.RESOUCE_CATEGORY_NAME = '人员证照') AS "parentTypeId", -- 证件类型父类Id T.RESOUCE_CATEGORY_ID AS "typeId", -- 证件类型子类Id (SELECT RESOUCE_CATEGORY_NAME FROM AHZH_USER.EPM_RESOUCE_CATEGORY T2 WHERE T2.RESOUCE_CATEGORY_ID = T.RESOUCE_CATEGORY_ID) AS "type", -- 证件类型子类 '0' AS "archiveType", -- 档案类型 '' AS "validityStatus", -- 有效期状态 RESOURCE_ARCHIVES_CODE AS "sysNumber" -- 档案编号 FROM AHZH_USER.EPM_RESOUCE_ARCHIVES T WHERE RESOUCE_TYPE = 2

SELECT T.RESOURCE_IDENTIFIER AS "number", -- 证件编号 RESOUCE_ARCHIVES_ID AS "archiveId", -- 档案id DECODE(STAT, '在库', '0', '锁定', '1', '已借出', '1') AS "useStatus", -- 使用状态 '0' AS "delFlag", -- 删除标识 EFFECTIVE_DATE AS "startDate", -- 生效时间 EXP_DATE AS "endDate", -- 失效时间 REMARK AS "remarks", -- 备注 CREATE_BY AS "createBy", -- 创建人 CREATE_DATE AS "createTime", -- 创建时间 LAST_UPDATE_BY AS "updateBy", -- 修改人 LAST_UPDATE_DATE AS "updateTime", -- 修改时间 RESOURCE_NAME AS "name", -- 档案名称 (SELECT T2.USERNAME FROM AHZH_USER.CPCUSER T2 WHERE T2.SYSUSERID = T.KEEPER) AS "safekeepUser", -- 保管人 KEEPER AS "safekeepUserId", -- 保管人Id IS_USABLE AS "isEnabled", -- 是否可用 '印章证照' AS "parentType", -- 证件类型父类 (SELECT RESOUCE_CATEGORY_ID FROM AHZH_USER.EPM_RESOUCE_CATEGORY T2 WHERE T2.RESOUCE_CATEGORY_NAME = '印章证照') AS "parentTypeId", -- 证件类型父类Id T.RESOUCE_CATEGORY_ID AS "typeId", -- 证件类型子类Id (SELECT RESOUCE_CATEGORY_NAME FROM AHZH_USER.EPM_RESOUCE_CATEGORY T2 WHERE T2.RESOUCE_CATEGORY_ID = T.RESOUCE_CATEGORY_ID) AS "type", -- 证件类型子类 '0' AS "archiveType", -- 档案类型 '' AS "validityStatus", -- 有效期状态 RESOURCE_ARCHIVES_CODE AS "sysNumber" -- 档案编号 FROM AHZH_USER.EPM_RESOUCE_ARCHIVES T WHERE RESOUCE_TYPE = 3

SELECT RESOUCE_ARCHIVES_ID AS "archiveId", -- 账户id T.RESOURCE_IDENTIFIER AS "number", -- 账户编码 RESOURCE_NAME AS "name", -- 账号名称 '' AS "area", -- 所属地区 DECODE(IS_CA_LOCK, '是', '0', '否', '1', '') AS "isCA", -- 是否AC锁 (SELECT T2.USERNAME FROM AHZH_USER.CPCUSER T2 WHERE T2.SYSUSERID = T.KEEPER) AS "safekeepUser", -- 保管人 KEEPER AS "safekeepUserId", -- 保管人Id URL AS "biddingWebSite", -- 招标网址 RESOURCE_IDENTIFIER AS "account", -- 账号 '0' AS "delFlag", -- 删除标识 CREATE_BY AS "createBy", -- 创建人 CREATE_DATE AS "createTime", -- 创建时间 LAST_UPDATE_DATE AS "updateTime", -- 修改时间 LAST_UPDATE_BY AS "updateBy", -- 修改人 '' AS "validityStatus", -- 有效期状态 '' AS "isEnabled", -- 是否可用 STAT AS "useStatus", -- 使用状态 EFFECTIVE_DATE AS "startDate", -- 生效时间 EXP_DATE AS "endDate", -- 失效时间 REMARK AS "remarks", -- 备注 RESOURCE_ARCHIVES_CODE AS "sysNumber", -- 账户编号 RESOURCE_NAME AS "platformName", -- 账号所属平台名称 '2' AS "archiveType" -- 档案类型 FROM AHZH_USER.EPM_RESOUCE_ARCHIVES T WHERE RESOUCE_TYPE = 5

SELECT T.RESOURCE_IDENTIFIER AS "number", --- 业绩编码 T.RESOURCE_ARCHIVES_CODE AS "sysNumber", --- 业绩编号 T.RESOUCE_ARCHIVES_ID AS "archiveId", --- 业绩id '1' AS "archiveType", --- 档案类型 T.RESOURCE_NAME AS "name", --- 业绩名称 (SELECT PROJECT_ID FROM AHZH_USER.EPM_PROJECT T3 WHERE T3.PROJECT_CODE = T.RESOURCE_IDENTIFIER) AS "originalProjectId", --- 原项目Id (SELECT PROJECT_NAME FROM AHZH_USER.EPM_PROJECT T3 WHERE T3.PROJECT_CODE = T.RESOURCE_IDENTIFIER) AS "originalProjectName", --- 原项目名 (SELECT T4.PROJECT_CONTRACT_NAME FROM AHZH_USER.EPM_PROJECT_CONTRACT T4 WHERE T4.PROJECT_CONTRACT_ID = T.CONTACT_ID) AS "originalContractName", --- 原合同名 T.CONTACT_ID AS "originalContractId", --- 原合同Id T.CREATE_BY AS "createBy", --- 创建人 T.CREATE_DATE AS "createTime", --- 创建时间 T.LAST_UPDATE_BY AS "updateBy", --- 修改人 T.LAST_UPDATE_DATE AS "updateTime", --- 修改时间 '0' AS "delFlag", --- 删除标识 (SELECT DECODE(RESOUCE_CATEGORY_NAME, '暖通-多联机', '暖通', '暖通-风冷螺杆', '暖通', '暖通-水机', '暖通', '暖通-风冷模块', '暖通', '暖通-地源热泵', '暖通', '暖通-离心机', '暖通', '暖通-水冷螺杆', '暖通', '暖通-水源热泵', '暖通', RESOUCE_CATEGORY_NAME) FROM AHZH_USER.EPM_RESOUCE_CATEGORY T2 WHERE T2.RESOUCE_CATEGORY_ID = T.RESOUCE_CATEGORY_ID) AS "type", --- 业绩类别 T.RESOUCE_CATEGORY_ID AS "typeId", --- 业绩类别Id T.CONTRACT_AMOUNT AS "performance", --- 业绩 T.COMMENCEMENT_DATE AS "startWorkDate", --- 开工日期 T.COMPLETION_DATE AS "checkWorkDate", --- 验收日期 '' AS "useStatus", --- 使用状态 '' AS "validityStatus", --- 有效期状态 (SELECT T2.USERNAME FROM AHZH_USER.CPCUSER T2 WHERE T2.SYSUSERID = T.KEEPER) AS "safekeepUser", -- 保管人 T.KEEPER AS "safekeepUserId", -- 保管人Id (SELECT T2.CUSTOMER_NAME FROM AHZH_USER.CUSTOMER T2 WHERE T2.CUSTOMER_ID = T.LOAN_PARTNER_ID) AS "partnerName", -- 合伙人 T.LOAN_PARTNER_ID AS "partnerId" -- 合伙人Id FROM AHZH_USER.EPM_RESOUCE_ARCHIVES T, AHZH_USER.EPM_PROJECT TT WHERE RESOUCE_TYPE = 4 AND TT.PROJECT_ID(+) = T.LOAN_PROJECT_ID

SELECT LOWER(sys_guid()) AS "lendId", -- 记录id HEAD.RESOUCE_LOAN_RETURN_HEAD_ID AS "applyId", -- 申请ID (SELECT T2.RESOURCE_IDENTIFIER FROM AHZH_USER.EPM_RESOUCE_ARCHIVES T2 WHERE T2.RESOUCE_ARCHIVES_ID = LINE.RESOUCE_ARCHIVES_ID) AS "sysNumber", -- 档案编号 RESOUCE_ARCHIVES_ID AS "archiveId", -- 档案ID (SELECT T2.RESOURCE_NAME FROM AHZH_USER.EPM_RESOUCE_ARCHIVES T2 WHERE T2.RESOUCE_ARCHIVES_ID = LINE.RESOUCE_ARCHIVES_ID) AS "name", -- 档案名称 DECODE(LOAN_RETURN_STAT, 0, '1', 1, '1', 2, '0') AS "useStatus", -- 使用状态 LOAN_PROJECT_ID AS "projectId", -- 关联项目ID (SELECT T2.PROJECT_NAME FROM AHZH_USER.EPM_PROJECT T2 WHERE T2.PROJECT_ID = HEAD.LOAN_PROJECT_ID) AS "projectName", -- 关联项目 (SELECT T2.PARTNER_ID FROM AHZH_USER.VIEW_BASE_PROJECT T2 WHERE T2.PROJECT_ID = HEAD.LOAN_PROJECT_ID) as "partnerId", -- 合伙人ID (SELECT DISTINCT T2.PARTNER FROM AHZH_USER.VIEW_BASE_PROJECT T2 WHERE T2.PROJECT_ID = HEAD.LOAN_PROJECT_ID) as "partnerName", -- 合伙人名称 (SELECT T2.HOLDER_ID FROM AHZH_USER.VIEW_BASE_PROJECT T2 WHERE T2.PROJECT_ID = HEAD.LOAN_PROJECT_ID) as "ownerId", -- 业主ID (SELECT T2.HOLDER FROM AHZH_USER.VIEW_BASE_PROJECT T2 WHERE T2.PROJECT_ID = HEAD.LOAN_PROJECT_ID) as "ownerName", -- 业主名称 (SELECT SUBSTR(T2.ORGNAME, INSTR(T2.ORGNAME, '-', 1, 1) + 1) FROM AHZH_USER.CPCORG T2 WHERE T2.ORGID = HEAD.APPLY_DEPT_ID) AS "orgName", -- 申请部门 ESTIMATED_LOAN_DATE AS "expectLendTime", -- 预计借出时间 ESTIMATED_RETURN_DATE AS "expectReturnTime", -- 预计归还时间 RETURN_DATE AS "actualReturnTime", -- 实际归还时间 LOAN_DESCRIPTION AS "use", -- 用途 (SELECT T2.USERID FROM AHZH_USER.CPCUSER T2 WHERE T2.SYSUSERID = HEAD.LOAN_PERSON_ID) AS "userBy", -- 使用人 CREATE_BY AS "createBy", -- 创建人 CREATE_DATE AS "createTime", -- 创建时间 LAST_UPDATED_BY AS "updateBy", -- 修改人 LAST_UPDATED_DATE AS "updateTime", -- 修改时间 DECODE(STAT, 1, '0', 3, '1', '5', '2', '99', '2', '') AS "applyStatus", -- 审核状态 (CASE WHEN HEAD.STAT = 1 THEN '0' WHEN HEAD.STAT = 3 THEN '1' WHEN HEAD.STAT = 99 THEN '3' WHEN HEAD.STAT = 5 AND LINE.LOAN_RETURN_STAT = 0 THEN '4' WHEN HEAD.STAT = 5 AND LINE.LOAN_RETURN_STAT = 1 THEN '4' WHEN HEAD.STAT = 5 AND LINE.LOAN_RETURN_STAT = 2 THEN '5' ELSE '' END) AS "status" -- 状态 FROM AHZH_USER.EPM_RESOUCE_LOAN_RETURN_HEAD HEAD, AHZH_USER.EPM_RESOUCE_LOAN_RETURN_LINE LINE WHERE HEAD.RESOUCE_LOAN_RETURN_HEAD_ID = LINE.RESOUCE_LOAN_RETURN_HEAD_ID AND RESOUCE_TYPE IN (1, 2, 3)

SELECT LOWER(sys_guid()) AS "lendId", -- 记录id HEAD.RESOUCE_LOAN_RETURN_HEAD_ID AS "applyId", -- 申请ID (SELECT T2.RESOURCE_IDENTIFIER FROM AHZH_USER.EPM_RESOUCE_ARCHIVES T2 WHERE T2.RESOUCE_ARCHIVES_ID = LINE.RESOUCE_ARCHIVES_ID) AS "sysNumber", -- 档案编号 RESOUCE_ARCHIVES_ID AS "archiveId", -- 档案ID (SELECT T2.RESOURCE_NAME FROM AHZH_USER.EPM_RESOUCE_ARCHIVES T2 WHERE T2.RESOUCE_ARCHIVES_ID = LINE.RESOUCE_ARCHIVES_ID) AS "name", -- 档案名称 DECODE(LOAN_RETURN_STAT, 0, '1', 1, '1', 2, '0') AS "useStatus", -- 使用状态 LOAN_PROJECT_ID AS "projectId", -- 关联项目ID (SELECT T2.PROJECT_NAME FROM AHZH_USER.EPM_PROJECT T2 WHERE T2.PROJECT_ID = HEAD.LOAN_PROJECT_ID) AS "projectName", -- 关联项目 (SELECT T2.PARTNER_ID FROM AHZH_USER.VIEW_BASE_PROJECT T2 WHERE T2.PROJECT_ID = HEAD.LOAN_PROJECT_ID) as "partnerId", -- 合伙人ID (SELECT DISTINCT T2.PARTNER FROM AHZH_USER.VIEW_BASE_PROJECT T2 WHERE T2.PROJECT_ID = HEAD.LOAN_PROJECT_ID) as "partnerName", -- 合伙人名称 (SELECT T2.HOLDER_ID FROM AHZH_USER.VIEW_BASE_PROJECT T2 WHERE T2.PROJECT_ID = HEAD.LOAN_PROJECT_ID) as "ownerId", -- 业主ID (SELECT T2.HOLDER FROM AHZH_USER.VIEW_BASE_PROJECT T2 WHERE T2.PROJECT_ID = HEAD.LOAN_PROJECT_ID) as "ownerName", -- 业主名称 (SELECT SUBSTR(T2.ORGNAME, INSTR(T2.ORGNAME, '-', 1, 1) + 1) FROM AHZH_USER.CPCORG T2 WHERE T2.ORGID = HEAD.APPLY_DEPT_ID) AS "orgName", -- 申请部门 ESTIMATED_LOAN_DATE AS "expectLendTime", -- 预计借出时间 ESTIMATED_RETURN_DATE AS "expectReturnTime", -- 预计归还时间 RETURN_DATE AS "actualReturnTime", -- 实际归还时间 LOAN_DESCRIPTION AS "use", -- 用途 (SELECT T2.USERID FROM AHZH_USER.CPCUSER T2 WHERE T2.SYSUSERID = HEAD.LOAN_PERSON_ID) AS "userBy", -- 使用人 CREATE_BY AS "createBy", -- 创建人 CREATE_DATE AS "createTime", -- 创建时间 LAST_UPDATED_BY AS "updateBy", -- 修改人 LAST_UPDATED_DATE AS "updateTime", -- 修改时间 DECODE(STAT, 1, '0', 3, '1', '5', '2', '99', '2', '') AS "applyStatus", -- 审核状态 (CASE WHEN HEAD.STAT = 1 THEN '0' WHEN HEAD.STAT = 3 THEN '1' WHEN HEAD.STAT = 99 THEN '3' WHEN HEAD.STAT = 5 AND LINE.LOAN_RETURN_STAT = 0 THEN '4' WHEN HEAD.STAT = 5 AND LINE.LOAN_RETURN_STAT = 1 THEN '4' WHEN HEAD.STAT = 5 AND LINE.LOAN_RETURN_STAT = 2 THEN '5' ELSE '' END) AS "status" -- 状态 FROM AHZH_USER.EPM_RESOUCE_LOAN_RETURN_HEAD HEAD, AHZH_USER.EPM_RESOUCE_LOAN_RETURN_LINE LINE WHERE HEAD.RESOUCE_LOAN_RETURN_HEAD_ID = LINE.RESOUCE_LOAN_RETURN_HEAD_ID AND RESOUCE_TYPE IN (5)

SELECT LOWER(sys_guid()) AS "lendId", -- 记录id HEAD.RESOUCE_LOAN_RETURN_HEAD_ID AS "applyId", -- 申请ID (SELECT T2.RESOURCE_IDENTIFIER FROM AHZH_USER.EPM_RESOUCE_ARCHIVES T2 WHERE T2.RESOUCE_ARCHIVES_ID = LINE.RESOUCE_ARCHIVES_ID) AS "sysNumber", -- 档案编号 LINE.RESOUCE_ARCHIVES_ID AS "archiveId", -- 档案ID (SELECT T2.RESOURCE_NAME FROM AHZH_USER.EPM_RESOUCE_ARCHIVES T2 WHERE T2.RESOUCE_ARCHIVES_ID = LINE.RESOUCE_ARCHIVES_ID) AS "name", -- 档案名称 HEAD.LOAN_PROJECT_ID AS "projectId", -- 关联项目ID (SELECT T2.PROJECT_NAME FROM AHZH_USER.EPM_PROJECT T2 WHERE T2.PROJECT_ID = HEAD.LOAN_PROJECT_ID) AS "projectName", -- 关联项目 (SELECT T2.PARTNER_ID FROM AHZH_USER.VIEW_BASE_PROJECT T2 WHERE T2.PROJECT_ID = HEAD.LOAN_PROJECT_ID) as "partnerId", -- 合伙人ID (SELECT DISTINCT T2.PARTNER FROM AHZH_USER.VIEW_BASE_PROJECT T2 WHERE T2.PROJECT_ID = HEAD.LOAN_PROJECT_ID) as "partnerName", -- 合伙人名称 (SELECT T2.HOLDER_ID FROM AHZH_USER.VIEW_BASE_PROJECT T2 WHERE T2.PROJECT_ID = HEAD.LOAN_PROJECT_ID) as "ownerId", -- 业主ID (SELECT T2.HOLDER FROM AHZH_USER.VIEW_BASE_PROJECT T2 WHERE T2.PROJECT_ID = HEAD.LOAN_PROJECT_ID) as "ownerName", -- 业主名称 (SELECT SUBSTR(T2.ORGNAME, INSTR(T2.ORGNAME, '-', 1, 1) + 1) FROM AHZH_USER.CPCORG T2 WHERE T2.ORGID = HEAD.APPLY_DEPT_ID) AS "orgName", -- 申请部门 HEAD.ESTIMATED_LOAN_DATE AS "expectLendTime", -- 预计借出时间 HEAD.ESTIMATED_RETURN_DATE AS "expectReturnTime", -- 预计归还时间 LINE.RETURN_DATE AS "actualReturnTime", -- 实际归还时间 HEAD.LOAN_DESCRIPTION AS "use", -- 用途 (SELECT T2.USERID FROM AHZH_USER.CPCUSER T2 WHERE T2.SYSUSERID = HEAD.LOAN_PERSON_ID) AS "userBy", -- 使用人 HEAD.CREATE_BY AS "createBy", -- 创建人 HEAD.CREATE_DATE AS "createTime", -- 创建时间 HEAD.LAST_UPDATED_BY AS "updateBy", -- 修改人 HEAD.LAST_UPDATED_DATE AS "updateTime", -- 修改时间 DECODE(LINE.LOAN_RETURN_STAT, 0, '1', 1, '1', 2, '0') AS "useStatus", -- 使用状态 DECODE(HEAD.STAT, 1, '0', 3, '1', '5', '2', '99', '2', '') AS "applyStatus", -- 审核状态 (CASE WHEN HEAD.STAT = 1 THEN '0' WHEN HEAD.STAT = 3 THEN '1' WHEN HEAD.STAT = 99 THEN '3' WHEN HEAD.STAT = 5 AND LINE.LOAN_RETURN_STAT = 0 THEN '4' WHEN HEAD.STAT = 5 AND LINE.LOAN_RETURN_STAT = 1 THEN '4' WHEN HEAD.STAT = 5 AND LINE.LOAN_RETURN_STAT = 2 THEN '5' ELSE '' END) AS "status" FROM AHZH_USER.EPM_RESOUCE_LOAN_RETURN_HEAD HEAD, AHZH_USER.EPM_RESOUCE_LOAN_RETURN_LINE LINE WHERE HEAD.RESOUCE_LOAN_RETURN_HEAD_ID = LINE.RESOUCE_LOAN_RETURN_HEAD_ID AND RESOUCE_TYPE IN (4)
SELECT WM_CONCAT(LOAN_RETURN_STAT) AS "STAT" FROM (SELECT DISTINCT T.LOAN_RETURN_STAT FROM AHZH_USER.EPM_RESOUCE_LOAN_RETURN_LINE T WHERE T.RESOUCE_LOAN_RETURN_HEAD_ID = #{applyId})
SELECT MAX(T.RETURN_DATE) AS "RETURN_DATE" FROM AHZH_USER.EPM_RESOUCE_LOAN_RETURN_LINE T WHERE T.RESOUCE_LOAN_RETURN_HEAD_ID = #{applyId} AND T.LOAN_RETURN_STAT = 2
